metadata.title: CVE-2016-3862 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: media/ExifInterface.java in mediaserver in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.xbefore 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-09-01 does notproperly interact with the use of static variables in libjhead_jni, whichallows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial ofservice (memory corruption) via a crafted media file, aka internal bug29270469.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
